not_found.could_not_find_page: Sorry, we couldn't find this page.
not_found.do_not_worry: But dont worry, you can find plenty of other things on our homepage.

footer.the_source_code_is_available_on: The source code is available on

homepage.title: Collection of modern profile cards
homepage.description: DevSocialsStats is an open-source project aimed at analyzing social media statistics from popular platforms and tracking valuable insights into developer activity.

subtitles.start_your_open_source_journey_here: Start your open source journey here!
subtitles.test_our_card_preview_with_your_informat: Test our card preview with your information

texts.enter_github_username: Enter your GitHub username in the box below and preview what your Business Dev Card could look like!

info.black_chip: Use NPM to install customizable card components in your project
info.red_chip: Visit the playground to conveniently download your preferred cards as PNG files
info.blue_chip: Integrate our API to retrieve cards in HTML format

track_statistics.title: Track Statistics
track_statistics.text: Monitor data from platforms like GitHub, GitLab, Stack Overflow, and LinkedIn for a specific user.

collaboration_patterns.title: Collaboration Patterns
collaboration_patterns.text: Analyze collaboration patterns among developers, including collaboration networks, co-authorship relationships, and project contributions.

info_presentation.title: Info Presentation
info_presentation.text: Use our card and panel format to efficiently display user information in specific sectors.

enhance_your_skills.title: Enhance Your Skills
enhance_your_skills.text: Contributing to open-source projects enhances your coding skills and familiarity with new technologies. You gain practical experience, solve complex problems, and stay current with software development trends, aiding your growth as a developer.

build_a_professional_network.title: Build a Professional Network
build_a_professional_network.text: Open-source communities unite global developers, offering connections with peers, mentors, and potential employers. Contributing to these projects can lead to job opportunities, collaborations, and access to a wealth of shared knowledge and resources.

boost_your_portfolio.title: Boost Your Portfolio
boost_your_portfolio.text: Contributing to open-source projects showcases your skills and dedication, enhancing your portfolio and making you more attractive to employers and clients. A strong presence in the community demonstrates your commitment and can earn you recognition and respect from peers.

enhanced_profile_visibility.title: Enhanced Profile Visibility
enhanced_profile_visibility.point4: Difficulties in conveying your expertise to potential recruiters?
enhanced_profile_visibility.text: DevAnalytics has got you covered! With our easy-to-use card playground, all of your information can staycondensed in your own customizable card!

docs.description: Valuable insights into developer activity and engagement.
docs.installation: How to install dependencies or use in other ways the product?
docs.roadmap: What are our plans of action?

components.all_in_one_dev: Provides an in-depth look into a developer's activities across multiple platforms.
components.business_dev: Provides an overview of GitHub stats and information provided by the user on their GitHub profile.
